Actions to promote optimal iodine nutrition in pregnant and lactating women
The actions summarized in the section on iodine in young children, pages 30–31, apply to 
pregnant and lactating women.
4.6 Nutrition care and support for pregnant women during emergencies1  
 ( 152)
WHO RECOMMENDATION
See page 36 for recommendation. 
Rationale and evidence
